name: nu_flashcards
description: In this week's assignment, you will create the backend for a basic flashcard application.  The backend will essentially constitute an API that allows users to create two types of flashcards.  1. **Basic** flashcards, which have a front (_"Who was the first president of the United States?"_), and a back (_"George Washington"_).  2. **Cloze-Deleted** flashcards, which present _partial_ text (_"... was the first president of the United States."_), and the full text when the user requests it (_"George Washington was the first president of the United States."_)
